title: Can I watch American Horror Story Season 1 without getting scared much? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you think so then you’re highly mistaken. Some scenes are certain to increase your heartbeats. It’s not filthy horror but does a good job to scare the shit out you. It’s extremely strange and twisted to keep you hooked on even if you’re scared. DO WATCH!

I can tell you about this show because i just finished season 1 only 10 mins ago ! ;) Okay here is a short but clear review : AHS has pretty fine actors ! Especially violet (@Taissa Farmiga) is so beautiful and cute ! Story is so perfect , episode by episode you catch something worthy to watch next episode not a single min boring. 8.5/10 is my rating. How much Horrible ? Not so much horrible ! Yeah there are 3–4 scenes are quite horrible but you can easily watch it. Yeah , AHS season 1 in mUST watch :)

Bro,let me Tell you there is No other show like American horror story in horror Genre. It's currently in 7th season but this show never disappoints me. Let me Tell you ,when I saw theAhs for first season ,I was intrigued by the show.and i suggest you that if you are strong hearted Then only watch it .
